#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int col(char s[10])
{

    {
        if(!strcmp(s,"black"))return 0;
        else if(!strcmp(s,"brown"))return 1;
        else if(!strcmp(s,"red"))return 2;
        else if(!strcmp(s,"orange"))return 3;
        else if(!strcmp(s,"yellow"))return 4;
        else if(!strcmp(s,"green"))return 5;
        else if(!strcmp(s,"blue"))return 6;
        else if(!strcmp(s,"violet"))return 7;
        else if(!strcmp(s,"grey"))return 8;
        else return 9;
    }
}
int main()
{
    int d,c,b,a;
    char ds[10],cs[10],bs[10],as[10];
    scanf("%s %s %s %s",ds,cs,bs,as);
    d=col(ds);
    c=col(cs);
    b=col(bs);
    a=col(as);
    printf("%ld",(4096*d+256*c+16*b+a));
    while(a--)
    printf("0");
    printf(" Guntur\n");
    return 0;

}
